name: Pew Pew (More Foes)
description:
Pew Pew!

We love cats and we love lasers, so we created a cat killing puny humans with a laser gun. A cat that happens to be suspiciously similar to Grumpy, but we'll call him…Grampy, because of the copyright and all that.

How to Play:

Mouse to aim
Left Mouse Button to fire
AWSD to strafe
Space to enter in reverse time

Items:

  • HP
  • Mega HP
  • Invulnerability
  • Haste
  • Pawn Damage
  • Ricochet ( +1 beam)
  • Pew Pew ( permanent weapon haste)
  • BFG (permanent weapon damage)

Credits:

morefoes.com
